desc: Turn base game.Each turn a player can place a "hand character/s" from his hand to the game gird.After placing to the gird the character/s will move/attack automatically.The object is to kill all "life characters"I need about 6 different characters + 6 symbols to represent the different game aspects:1) Hand character - A player will have X hand characters/cards. They will be shown one next to the other. Each one will have different properties, like: Mana (number), Power (number), Life (number) and a property = (text). This should be shown as a general character, maybe abstract.....2) User life character - This character will represent the life for the user. It will be placed on the game grid at the start of the game. Need to be unique!3-6) Those are the 4 grid characters that will move/attack the other enemy characters . They should be epic characters, different from each other.More:- 4 symbols that will represent 4 Weapons/Powers of the 4 grid characters.-Each character should be design in 2 colors, for each player.-All characters (except for the Hand character) will need animations (sprite sheets) for: Stand, Walk, Attack, Die and use property states.-Sound: Each character will need a sound for each state (place on hand, place on grid, walk, attack, die, use property.-Sound: Game sound affects: start turn, end turn, clicks, win, lose.This is my first project I'm building alone and I'm pretty done with the game logic. Need the Graphics and Sound to make it the cool game I think it will be.I have many more features and new characters that will be need design after this first phase.Thanks,Yaniv
title: Game animated charecters

desc: Hi everyone, I am looking for an animation to be done for my business. I am a home buyer and i purchase directly from home owner.There are many benefits of selling directly to me rather then a real estate agent and or putting it on the real estate market and i will share them below. If you can animate all this with a female voice over explaining some of the benefits of using a direct cash buyer like me rather than turning to a real estate agency. I will list more information below which you may use to reference.Also here are some video just so you have an idea of what i am asking for. Like i said a voice over with a lady is important if it is difficult to include you may do it without, but this can give you an idea of how it should look. The story line is not the same.Youtube:[url removed, login to view][url removed, login to view][url removed, login to view]Please include the followingSelling w/ An Agent	SOLD To Allan Buys HomesCommissions / Fees:	6% on average is paid by you, the seller	SOLD To Allan Buys Homes NONEWho Pays Closing Costs?:	2% on average is paid by you, the seller	SOLD To Allan Buys Homes NONE – We pay all costsInspection & Financing Contingency*:	Yes, up to 15% of sales fall through	SOLD To Allan Buys Homes NONEAppraisal Needed:	Yes, sale is often subject to appraisal	SOLD To Allan Buys Homes NONE – We make cash offersAverage Days Until Sold:	+/- 91 Days	SOLD To Allan Buys Homes IMMEDIATE CASH OFFERNumber of Showings:	It Depends	1 (Just Us)Closing Date:	30-60 +/- days after accepting buyers offer	SOLD To Allan Buys Homes The Date Of YOUR CHOICEWho Pays For Repairs?:	Negotiated During Inspection Period	SOLD To Allan Buys Homes NONE – We pay for all repairsAlso pleasse include some other things to make story line better.Selling To Allan Buys Homes vs. Listing With A Local AgentEven in a sellers market like New York, it’s smart to look at your options and see what will actually help you best reach your goals with the sale of your house. While you may be able to get a higher “top line” sales price listing with a local Jersey City, Hudson County, New Jersey agent, that doesn’t always boil down to more money in your pocket or less headache. Dive into the details below to compare your options.Work The Numbers And See Which Way Helps You Get There…When you really work the numbers you start to see the real benefits that each way of selling your house offers.Yes, here at Allan Buys Homes we won’t be able to offer you full retail value for your house… but we also offer other benefits that going the traditional house sale route can’t offer.Like…From offer to close and cash in your hand in as little as 7 daysYou can get rid of the headache of that property fast and avoid paying any more utility payments, tax payments, insurance payments, mortgage payments, you get the drill. If you list your house and wait 90+ days to close… you have to figure in all of the costs of holding that property during the time you have that property listed and are waiting for the property to close.Don’t worry about paying those pesky closing fees (we’ve got you covered)Because we are a full-service professional home buyer here in , we make it easy for you. We pay for all of the closing costs. What we offer you is what you get (of course minus any mortgage payoff or other encumbrances on the property). Pretty refreshing eh?So when you add up the time you could save by working with Allan Buys Homes , the no-hassle experience, and the money you’ll save on commissions, fees, and holding costs while you wait to sell the traditional route… for many area home owners selling to a professional house buyer is the best viable option.
title: Animation for Real Estate
